018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang;
019
020import static java.lang.Boolean.getBoolean;
021import static java.lang.System.out;
022import static java.lang.Thread.currentThread;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_TEST;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.internal.SharedFormatter.format;
031
032import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
033import java.io.PrintStream;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
036import java.util.function.Function;
037import java.util.function.Supplier;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
043
044/**
045 *  <p>{@summary Some functions for DEBUG and TEST output to the console.}</p>
046 *
047 *  @version $Id: DebugOutput.java 1005 2022-02-03 12:40:52Z tquadrat $
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @UMLGraph.link
050 *  @since 0.1.0
051 */
052@UtilityClass
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: DebugOutput.java 1005 2022-02-03 12:40:52Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
055public final class DebugOutput
056{
057        /*------------*\
058    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
059        \*------------*/
060    /**
061     *  The printer.
062     */
063    private static Printer m_Printer = out::printf;
064
065        /*------------------------*\
066    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
067        \*------------------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The DEBUG flag.
070     *
071     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG
072     */
073    private static final boolean m_IsDebug;
074
075    /**
076     *  The TEST flag.
077     *
078     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST
079     */
080    private static final boolean m_IsTest;
081
082    static
083    {
084        m_IsDebug = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG );
085        m_IsTest = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_TEST );
086    }
087
088        /*--------------*\
089    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
090        \*--------------*/
091    /**
092     *  No instance is allowed for this class!
093     */
094    private DebugOutput() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( DebugOutput.class ); }
095
096        /*---------*\
097    ====** Methods **==========================================================
098        \*---------*/
099    /**
100     *  If the
101     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
102     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
103     *  is set, execute the given
104     *  {@link Function}
105     *  and write the result to
106     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
107     *
108     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Function} for the output.
109     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
110     *
111     *  @deprecated Use
112     *      {@link #ifDebug(Function, Object...)}
113     *      instead.
114     */
115    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
116    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
117    public static final void debugOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( supplier, args ); }
118
119    /**
120     *  If the
121     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
122     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
123     *  is set and the given
124     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
125     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
126     *  {@link Function}
127     *  and write the result to
128     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
129     *
130     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
131     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
132     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
133     *
134     *  @deprecated Use
135     *      {@link #ifDebug(BooleanSupplier, Function, Object...)}
136     *      instead.
137     */
138    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
139    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
140    public static final void debugOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( condition, supplier, args ); }
141
142    /**
143     *  If the
144     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
145     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
146     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
147     *  given
148     *  {@link Function}
149     *  and write the result to
150     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
151     *
152     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
153     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
154     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
155     *
156     *  @deprecated Use
157     *      {@link #ifDebug(boolean, Function, Object...)}
158     *      instead.
159     */
160    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
161    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
162    public static final void debugOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifDebug( condition, supplier, args ); }
163
164    /**
165     *  <p>{@summary If the
166     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
167     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
168     *  is set, a call to
169     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
170     *  is made.}</p>
171     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
172     *
173     *  @param  e   The exception.
174     *
175     *  @deprecated Use
176     *      {@link #ifDebug(Throwable)}
177     *      instead.
178     */
179    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
180    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
181    public static final void debugOutput( final Throwable e ) { ifDebug( e ); }
182
183    /**
184     *  <p>{@summary This method will find the caller for the method that is
185     *  identified by its name and class, and returns the appropriate stack
186     *  trace element.}</p>
187     *  <p>The return value is
188     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
189     *  when the provided method is not on the stack trace.</p>
190     *
191     *  @param  methodName  The name of the method that we need the caller for.
192     *  @param  owningClass The class for the called method.
193     *  @return An instance of
194     *      {@link Optional}
195     *      that holds the stack trace element for the caller.
196     */
197    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
198    public static final Optional<StackTraceElement> findCaller( final String methodName, final Class<?> owningClass )
199    {
200        requireNotEmptyArgument( methodName, "methodName" );
201        final var className = requireNonNullArgument( owningClass, "owningClass" ).getName();
202
203        //---* Retrieve the stack *--------------------------------------------
204        final var stackTraceElements = currentThread().getStackTrace();
205        final var len = stackTraceElements.length;
206
207        //---* Search the stack *----------------------------------------------
208        Optional<StackTraceElement> retValue = Optional.empty();
209        FindLoop: for( var i = 0; (i < len) && retValue.isEmpty(); ++i )
210        {
211            /*
212             * This loop searches the stack until it will find the entry for
213             * that matches that for the provided arguments on it. It assumes
214             * then that the next entry on the stack will belong to the caller
215             * for this method.
216             */
217            if( className.equals( stackTraceElements [i].getClassName() ) && methodName.equals( stackTraceElements [i].getMethodName() ) )
218            {
219                if( i + 1 < len ) retValue = Optional.of( stackTraceElements [i + 1] );
220            }
221        }   //  FindLoop:
222
223        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
224        return retValue;
225    }   //  findCaller()
226
227    /**
228     *  If the
229     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
230     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
231     *  is set, call the specified
232     *  {@link Printer}
233     *  to write the given message.
234     *
235     *  @param  message The message; it is a format as defined for
236     *      {@link java.util.Formatter}.
237     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
238     *
239     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
240     */
241    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
242    public static final void ifDebug( final String message, final Object... args )
243    {
244        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
245        {
246            findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
247                .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", format( message, args ), c ),
248                    () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", format( message, args ) ) );
249        }
250    }   //  ifDebug()
251
252    /**
253     *  If the
254     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
255     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
256     *  is set, call the specified
257     *  {@link Printer}
258     *  to write the given message.
259     *
260     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Function} for the output.
261     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
262     *
263     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
264     */
265    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
266    public static final void ifDebug( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
267    {
268        if( m_IsDebug )
269        {
270            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
271            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
272            {
273                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
274                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
275                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
276            }
277        }
278    }   //  ifDebug()
279
280    /**
281     *  If the
282     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
283     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
284     *  is set and the given
285     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
286     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
287     *  {@link Function}
288     *  and call the specified
289     *  {@link Printer}
290     *  to write result.
291     *
292     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
293     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
294     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
295     *
296     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
297     */
298    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
299    public static final void ifDebug( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
300    {
301        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )
302        {
303            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
304            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
305            {
306                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
307                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
308                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
309            }
310        }
311    }   //  debugOutput()
312
313    /**
314     *  If the
315     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
316     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
317     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
318     *  given
319     *  {@link Function}
320     *  and call the specified
321     *  {@link Printer}
322     *  to write the result.
323     *
324     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
325     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
326     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
327     *
328     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
329     */
330    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
331    public static final void ifDebug( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
332    {
333        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
334        {
335            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
336            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
337            {
338                findCaller( "ifDebug", DebugOutput.class )
339                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
340                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message ) );
341            }
342        }
343    }   //  ifDebug()
344
345    /**
346     *  <p>{@summary If the
347     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
348     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
349     *  is set, a call to
350     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace()}
351     *  is made.}</p>
352     *  <p>Use this to provide a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
353     *
354     *  @param  e   The exception.
355     *
356     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
357     */
358    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
359    public static final void ifDebug( final Throwable e )
360    {
361        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
362        {
363            m_Printer.print( "DEBUG: " );
364            final var bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
365            e.printStackTrace( new PrintStream( bos ) );
366            m_Printer.println( bos.toString() );
367        }
368    }   //  ifDebug()
369
370    /**
371     *  If the
372     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
373     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
374     *  is set, call the specified
375     *  {@link Printer}
376     *  to write the given message.
377     *
378     *  @param  message The message; it is a format as defined for
379     *      {@link java.util.Formatter}.
380     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
381     *
382     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
383     */
384    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
385    public static final void ifTest( final String message, final Object... args )
386    {
387        if( m_IsTest && nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
388        {
389            findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
390                .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", format( message, args ), c ),
391                    () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", format( message, args ) ) );
392        }
393    }   //  ifDebug()

412    {

414        {
415            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );

422        }
423    }   //  ifTest()

425    /**
426     *  If the
427     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
428     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
429     *  is set and the given
430     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
431     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
432     *  {@link Function}
433     *  and call the specified
434     *  {@link Printer}
435     *  to write the result.
436     *
437     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.

439     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.

441     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
442     */

444    public static final void ifTest( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
445    {
446        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )

448            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
449            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
450            {
451                findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
452                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
453                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", message ) );
454            }
455        }
456    }   //  ifTest()

458    /**
459     *  If the
460     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
461     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
462     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
463     *  given
464     *  {@link Supplier}
465     *  and call the specified
466     *  {@link Printer}
467     *  to write the result.
468     *
469     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
470     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
471     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
472     *
473     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
474     */
475    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
476    public static final void ifTest( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
477    {
478        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
479        {
480            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
481            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() )
482            {
483                findCaller( "ifTest", DebugOutput.class )
484                    .ifPresentOrElse( c -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST - %2$s: %1$s%n", message, c.toString() ),
485                        () -> m_Printer.printf( "TEST: %s%n", message ) );
486            }
487        }
488    }   //  ifTest()

490    /**
491     *  <p>{@summary If the
492     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
493     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
494     *  is set, a call to
495     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace()}
496     *  is made.}</p>
497     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
498     *
499     *  @param  e   The exception.
500     *
501     *  @see #setPrinter(Printer)
502     */
503    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
504    public static final void ifTest( final Throwable e )
505    {
506        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
507        {
508            m_Printer.print( "TEST: " );
509            final var bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
510            e.printStackTrace( new PrintStream( bos ) );
511            m_Printer.println( bos.toString() );
512        }
513    }   //  ifTest()
514
515    /**
516     *  Returns the DEBUG flag.
517     *
518     *  @return {@code true} if the DEBUG flag is set, {@code false} otherwise.
519     *
520     *  @see CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG
521     */
522    public static final boolean isDebug() { return m_IsDebug; }
523
524    /**
525     *  Returns the TEST flag.
526     *
527     *  @return {@code true} if the TEST flag is set, {@code false} otherwise.
528     *
529     *  @see CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST
530     */
531    public static final boolean isTest() { return m_IsTest; }
532
533    /**
534     *  <p>{@summary Assigns the
535     *  {@link Printer}
536     *  for the DEBUG/TEST output.}</p>
537     *  <p>The default implementation writes to
538     *  {@link System#out}.</p>
539     *
540     *  @param  printer The printer
541     */
542    public static final void setPrinter( final Printer printer )
543    {
544        m_Printer = requireNonNullArgument( printer, "printer" );
545    }   //  setPrinter()
546
547    /**
548     *  If the
549     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
550     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
551     *  is set, execute the given
552     *  {@link Function}
553     *  and write the result to
554     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
555     *
556     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
557     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
558     *
559     *  @deprecated Use
560     *      {@link #ifTest(Function, Object...)}
561     *      instead.
562     */
563    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
564    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
565    public static final void testOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( supplier, args ); }

567    /**
568     *  If the
569     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
570     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
571     *  is set and the given
572     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
573     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
574     *  {@link Function}
575     *  and write the result to
576     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
577     *
578     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
579     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
580     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
581     *
582     *  @deprecated Use
583     *      {@link #ifTest(BooleanSupplier, Function, Object...)}  }
584     *      instead.
585     */
586    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
587    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
588    public static final void testOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( condition, supplier, args ); }
589
590    /**
591     *  If the
592     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
593     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
594     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
595     *  given
596     *  {@link Supplier}
597     *  and write the result to
598     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
599     *
600     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
601     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
602     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
603     *
604     *  @deprecated Use
605     *      {@link #ifTest(boolean, Function, Object...)}
606     *      instead.
607     */
608    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
609    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
610    public static final void testOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args ) { ifTest( condition, supplier, args ); }
611
612    /**
613     *  <p>{@summary If the
614     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
615     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
616     *  is set, a call to
617     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
618     *  is made.}</p>
619     *  <p>Use this to provide a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
620     *
621     *  @param  e   The exception.
622     *
623     *  @deprecated Use
624     *      {@link #ifTest(Throwable)}
625     *      instead.
626     */
627    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
628    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.1.0" )
629    public static final void testOutput( final Throwable e ) { ifTest( e ); }
630}
631//  class DebugOutput
632
633/*
634 *  End of File
635 */
